definition.text: End rate is the close rate of the candle corresponding to the datetime of the end property.

paragraphs.text: In the context of a strategy, it is the close rate of the last closed candle at the moment the strategy is triggered-off.
In the context of a position, it is the close rate of the last closed candle at the moment the close stage is closed.
In the context of an episode, it is the close rate of the last closed candle at the moment the episode ends.
initialValue allows resetting the initial state of the node to an arbitrary value.
